properties.description: Architect-designed luxury house with a rooftop garden in the heart of Colombo.
properties.longDescription: This stunning 4-bedroom architectural masterpiece offers the pinnacle of luxury living in Colombo's most prestigious neighborhood. Featuring a sprawling rooftop garden, open-concept living areas, and high-end finishes throughout, this home is designed for those who appreciate elegance and privacy.

properties.description: Modern sea-view apartment with access to gym and swimming pool.
properties.longDescription: Experience coastal urban living in this sleek 2-bedroom apartment. Located in Colpetty, the unit boasts floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic views of the Indian Ocean. Residents enjoy exclusive access to a state-of-the-art fitness center, an infinity pool, and 24-hour concierge service.

properties.description: Stunning colonial-style villa perfect for a boutique hotel or family home.
properties.longDescription: A rare find on Negombo's Beach Road, this expansive 5-bedroom colonial villa combines historic charm with modern convenience. With large verandas, high ceilings, and lush tropical gardens, it is an ideal investment for a boutique hotel or a grand family estate.

properties.description: Cozy bungalow with a breathtaking view of the mountain ranges.
properties.longDescription: Nestled in the hills of Han Thana, Kandy, this 3-bedroom bungalow offers peace and tranquility. The property features traditional Kandyan architecture and a large terrace perfect for enjoying the misty mountain mornings and cool climate.

properties.description: Luxury 3-bedroom unit in a high-rise with 24/7 security and backup power.
properties.longDescription: This premium 3-bedroom apartment in Rajagiriya offers a sophisticated lifestyle with rapid access to the city center. The high-rise building is equipped with modern safety systems, standby generators, and dedicated parking, ensuring comfort and peace of mind.

properties.description: Value-for-money family home located in a quiet residential area.
properties.longDescription: Perfect for first-time buyers, this 3-bedroom house in Malabe provides a spacious and secure environment for a growing family. It features a private driveway, a small backyard, and is located within walking distance of local schools and supermarkets.
